questions.title: Context of the Organization
questions.objective: Understand the internal and external context relevant to the AI management system.
questions.tooltipText: This section aligns with clauses 4.1 to 4.4 of the AI management system standard.

questions.text: Has the organization determined any external issues that are relevant to its purpose and that affect its ability to achieve the intended results of its AI management system?

followUp.title: External Issues
followUp.text: Please list or upload supporting documentation.

questions.text: Has the organization determined any internal issues that are relevant to its purpose and that affect its ability to achieve the intended results of its AI management system?

followUp.title: Internal Issues
followUp.text: Please list or upload supporting documentation.

questions.text: Has the organization determined whether climate change is a relevant issue in the context of its AI management system?
Has the organization considered the intended purpose of the AI systems that are developed, provided, or used by the organization?

followUp.title: AI System Purposes
followUp.text: Please list or upload supporting documentation.

questions.text: Has the organization determined its role with respect to the AI systems that are developed, provided, or used by the organization?

followUp.title: AI System Roles
followUp.text: Please list or upload supporting documentation.

questions.text: Has the organization identified the interested parties that are relevant to its AI management system?
Has the organization determined the relevant requirements of these interested parties?
Has the organization decided which of these requirements will be addressed through its AI management system?
Has the organization determined the boundaries and applicability of its AI management system in order to establish its scope?
When determining the scope of its AI management system, has the organization considered external and internal issues as referred to in previous questions?
When determining the scope of its AI management system, has the organization considered interested parties, their requirements, and which of these requirements will be addressed?
Is the scope of the AI management system available as documented information?

Does the organization determine the scope of its AI management system to include activities related to leadership, planning, support, operation, performance, evaluation, improvement, controls, and objectives?
Has the organization established and implemented an AI management system that defines responsibilities, processes, and controls for managing AI-related activities?
Is the above AI management system continually maintained and improved by the organization?
Has the organization documented the above AI management system, including the necessary processes and their interactions?

questions.title: Leadership and Commitment
questions.objective: Ensure leadership commitment in the AI management system.
questions.tooltipText: This section aligns with clauses 5.1 to 5.3 of the AI management system standard.

questions.text: Which of the following actions does top management of the organization take to demonstrate leadership and commitment with respect to the organization AI management system? (Select all that apply)
options: Ensuring that the AI policy and AI objectives are established and are compatible with the strategic direction of the organization
Ensuring the integration of the AI management system requirements into the organization’s business processes
Ensuring that the resources needed for the AI management system are available
Communicating the importance of effective AI management and of conforming to the AI management system requirements
Ensuring that the AI management system achieves its intended result(s)
Directing and supporting persons to contribute to the effectiveness of the AI management system
Supporting other relevant roles to demonstrate their leadership as it applies to their areas of responsibility

followUp.title: Leadership and Commitment Actions
followUp.text: Please provide documentation or evidence of top management’s commitment.

questions.text: Has top management established an AI policy for the organization?

followUp.title: AI Policy Document
followUp.text: Please provide the AI policy document.

questions.text: Is the AI policy appropriate to the purpose of the organization?
Does the AI policy provide a clear framework for setting AI objectives?
Does the AI policy include a commitment to meet all applicable requirements?
Does the AI policy include a commitment to continual improvement of the AI management system?
Is the AI policy available as documented information? If yes, please provide all related document(s).
Does the AI policy refer as relevant to other organizational policies?
Has the AI policy been communicated clearly within the organization?
Is the AI policy available to external interested parties, as appropriate?
Has top management of the organization ensured that the responsibilities and authorities for relevant roles are assigned and communicated within the organization?

Has top management assigned the responsibility and authority for ensuring that the organization’s AI management system conforms to the requirements mentioned in the prior survey section about AI management system?
Has top management assigned the responsibility and authority for reporting on the performance of the organization’s AI management system to top management?
